mapper.select: select dongcode.sidoName sidoName, dongcode.gugunName gugunName, dongcode.dongName dongName, houseinfo.apartmentName aptName, houseinfo.lat lat, houseinfo.lng lng, housedeal.dealAmount dealAmount, housedeal.area area, housedeal.floor floor, houseinfo.roadName roadName, houseinfo.roadNameBonbun roadNameBonbun, houseinfo.roadNameBubun roadNameBubun from dongcode inner join houseinfo on dongcode.dongCode = houseinfo.dongCode inner join housedeal on housedeal.aptCode = houseinfo.aptCode where dongcode.sidoName = #{sido} and dongcode.gugunName=#{gugun} and dongcode.dongname=#{dong} and housedeal.dealYear = #{year} and housedeal.dealMonth = #{month} order by houseinfo.apartmentName ASC
select distinct(sidoName) from dongcode where sidoName is not NULL order by sidoName ASC
select distinct(gugunName) from dongcode where sidoName=#{sidoName} and gugunName is not NULL and gugunName != '창원시' order by gugunName ASC
select distinct(dongName) from dongcode where sidoName=#{sidoName} and gugunName=#{gugunName} and dongName is not NULL order by dongName ASC
select interest_area_no,member_no,sidoName,gugunName,dongName from interest_area where member_no = #{member_no} order by sidoName ASC

select houseinfo.apartmentName aptName, housedeal.area aptArea, housedeal.floor aptFloor, housedeal.dealAmount aptPrice, houseinfo.lat aptLat, houseinfo.lng aptLng from dongcode inner join houseinfo on dongcode.dongCode = houseinfo.dongCode inner join housedeal on housedeal.aptCode = houseinfo.aptCode where dongcode.sidoName = #{sidoName} and dongcode.gugunName=#{gugunName} and dongcode.dongname=#{dongName}
select 관서명 name, 구분 department, Latitude lat, Longitude lng from police
